short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces any instance of please,plz,pleaze,plox,plx,plis,pliz,pls into plock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces any instance of please, plz, pleaze, plox, plx, plis, pliz, pls into plock.  You should only install this if you are part of the bigman group (bigman.group) as this is an inside joke between a couple of friends, however, feel free to install it and give it a try.

There are a couple of planned features such as;
- Ability to change the regex to whatever you want it to be
- Whitelisting and blacklisting websites from changing the words
